summary: A demo script that leverages the Instructor library with OpenAI to parse natural language input into one of several typed action models (search, lookup, finish, generic) defined via Pydantic unions, then dispatches the appropriate helper function to perform the selected operation.
business_intent: Illustrates a reusable pattern for building AIâ€‘driven assistants that can understand user commands and map them to concrete actions, enabling automated search, data lookup, workflow completion, or generic task execution.
